title: Ticket #5694: SUBMIT_ATTRS can't set JobLeaseDuration to an expression
description:
SUBMIT_ATTRS can't set JobLeaseDuration to an expression.

  • bug1 When the code that parses the submit file looks it doesn't see JobLeaseDuration and so it sets a default that ends up overriding the value from SUBMIT_ATTRS.

  • bug2 if use JOB_LEASE_DURATION in SUBMIT_ATTRS, then the submit file parsing code fails unless the value of JOB_LEASE_DURATION is an integer. it cannot be an expression. It also stuffs a attribute named JOB_LEASE_DURATION into the job ad, which is harmless but confusing.
